column1: Beside these microorganisms, TctE / TctD homologues controlling the transport of tricarboxylic acid ( see section " Tricarboxylate utilization ") are present in the genera Salmonella, Burkholderia, Agrobacterium, Bordetella, Collinsella, Xylella, Xanthomonas, and Pseudomonas, particularly P. entomophila, all of which are found in association with eukaryotes.
